banner: Hey! I'm an engineering student at the University of Michigan who has risked her life dabbling in CSS to bring you this website. Thank you for your time today - I hope you enjoy your stay.
about: Based in the DM(V) and studying in Ann Arbor, I'm an experienced software engineer with extensive knowledge in full-stack development and robotics. Aside from my unhealthy obsession with all things science fiction, in my free time I enjoy being an amateur musician and dedicated gym rat.
